item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, October 14, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Busy Status Bar from Flipper Devices (396 points | 147 comments)
2. Show HN: Vortex – a high-performance columnar file format in Rust (59 points | 7 comments)
3. Gosub: A browser engine written in Rust (25 points | 8 comments)
4. DeepSeek: Advancing theorem proving in LLMs through large-scale synthetic data (64 points | 15 comments)
5. Sound Lab – A Simple Analogue Synthesiser (19 points | 1 comment)
6. Show HN: X11 tool to share a screen area in any video meeting (175 points | 89 comments)
7. Turn your Android phone into a modern ham radio transceiver (35 points | 12 comments)
8. PayloadCMS: Open-Source, Fullstack Next.js Framework (27 points | 3 comments)
9. Trying Out a Far Infrared Heated Poster (20 points | 9 comments)
10. Extracting financial disclosure and police reports with OpenAI Structured Output (62 points | 19 comments)
11. NASA's Europa Clipper Launch (121 points | 55 comments)
12. New images show state of preservation of Ernest Shackleton's ship (12 points | 2 comments)
13. Meissonic, High-Resolution Text-to-Image Synthesis on consumer graphics cards (8 points | discuss)
14. How to Make a Legit Sound Camera [video] (15 points | 2 comments)
15. When railroad dining cars were the height of luxury (14 points | 4 comments)
16. Exploring 120 years of timezones (2021) (64 points | 18 comments)
17. AlphaCodium outperforms direct prompting of OpenAI's o1 on coding problems (56 points | 33 comments)
18. Can a biologist fix a radio? What I learned while studying apoptosis (2002) [pdf] (9 points | 1 comment)
19. Curly-Cue: Geometric Methods for Highly Coiled Hair (149 points | 12 comments)
20. Cwal: Scripting Engine Without a Language (35 points | 4 comments)
21. Goodbye to an old spreadsheet (7 points | 3 comments)
22. Python client for the $20 Colmi R02 smart ring (293 points | 102 comments)
23. Furilabs Linux Phone (69 points | 101 comments)
24. Upgrading Uber's MySQL Fleet (192 points | 174 comments)
25. Counterintuitive Properties of High Dimensional Space (2018) (224 points | 54 comments)
26. Show HN: A VSCode Extension to edit HTML visually in real-time (201 points | 111 comments)
27. Huly – Open-source project management platform (416 points | 192 comments)
28. Mesh Shaders – The Future of Rendering [video] (31 points | 3 comments)
29. Making the Tibetan language a first-class citizen in the digital world (283 points | 137 comments)
30. Refurb weekend: the Symbolics MacIvory Lisp machine I have hated (167 points | 71 comments)
